pageContext.claim: “They're saying Death to America, and we have the former administration, as -- as represented by John Kerry -- not the best negotiator we've ever seen -- he never walked away from the table, except to be in that bicycle race, where he fell and broke his leg... At 73 years old, you never go into a bicycle race, OK?”
pageContext.analysis: Kerry was not in a bicycle race when he broke his leg; he was simply riding a bicycle.
